transferData.question: Did you transfer into mechatronics from another program @ UW?

transferPrograms.question: If yes, what program did you transfer from? (If you switched programs multiple times, please choose the one you were enrolled in before Tron)

transferTerm.question: If yes, what term did you transfer into Tron?

initialStream.question: What stream did you initially enroll @ UW with?

streamSwitch.question: Did you switch streams? (Only applicable if you switch streams from within Tron, transferring from other programs does not count)

initialStreamChoice.question: Why did you choose your initial stream?

streamSwitchReasons.question: If you switched streams, why did you switch?

streamAdvice.question: Any additional comments about streams, or advice you'd like to provide to future Trons?
responses: Stream 8 gives you time to build more of a portfolio when applying to jobs
Stream 8 is better for coop opportunities, you can choose!
Pros and cons with either streams, ultimately the choice of streams is probably negligible in the grand scheme of things
Stream 4 seems better for the first year. Having 1A and 1B back to back will drain you before you even reach to the second year
Stream 8 first year is goated
Doesn't matter as much as I had thought.
Choose stream 8 its better
Go in Stream 8 if you can and use your 1A to build your 1st experience in a design team.

If coming into the program with not much work/relevant experience, stream 8 gives you more time to develop that through design teams and courses, would recommend that as a better option than stream 4.
If you need more time to beef up your resume, go S8, otherwise go S4.
4 stream is the best stream
Choose 8 Stream
If you're in stream 4, have a resume ready before starting 1A
Everyone tried to get stream 8 for the coop advantage, but it was really not that important. Stream 4s got jobs just as easily as stream 8s overall.
Watch out for your coop cycle landing during summer terms, as it is more competitive to find an internship both in Canada and the US
Pick 8
Which stream you are in will entirely transform the next 5 years of your life and also doesn't matter at all.
Try as many things as you can! You never know what you might like or what you might dislike :).
Bing chill your way through life
Stream 8 on top
Stream 4 is the best because the expectations are low and it's easier to land your first co-op and also since you get to breathe after first 4 months and all the other terms
don't overlook people skills!
Go with Stream 8 and grind out design teams in the 1st 4 months of 1A
Actually pick the stream you want. I didn't know you could pick at all :P
You will fail at least one thing (dw about it)
Don't worry about streams too much
Participate in a design team. Courses don't teach you enough to apply at jobs
Doesn't really matter, so don't stress it imo
